display_long_description:
**HITMAN 3 VR: RELOADED IS A QUEST 3 AND QUEST 3S-ONLY TITLE**

In **HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded** Agent 47 returns as the world’s top assassin for  some of the most important contracts of his entire career.

[media]

Players can physically interact with the world of HITMAN in a number of different ways, including opening doors, dragging and throwing bodies, free-throwing items, vaulting, climbing pipes and ladders, free placing items such as the banana, using keypads, turning on vacuums, pistol whipping, punching, slapping, and more.

[media]

Key Features include:

* **Dual-wielding**: For the first time in the series, HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded introduces dual-wielding, allowing players to use two weapons or items simultaneously, adding a new dimension to strategic gameplay.

[media]

* **New art-style**: See Agent 47 in a whole new light with a new visual style that enhances the immersive experience.

[media]

* **Overhauled user interface**: HITMAN 3’s UI has been completely redesigned for VR, ensuring intuitive control and navigation as Agent 47.

[media]

* **Improved movement options**: HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded now offers fluid and natural movement options, making it easier than ever to navigate complex environments with speed and stealth.

[media]

* **Plus many more improvements**: From visual enhancements to refined gameplay mechanics, this is the most immersive untethered HITMAN VR experience to date, ensuring both HITMAN veterans and new players alike can enjoy the ultimate virtual reality assassination experience.

[media]

**HITMAN 3 VR: RELOADED IS A QUEST 3 AND QUEST 3S-ONLY TITLE**

In **HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded** Agent 47 returns as the world’s top assassin for  some of the most important contracts of his entire career.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392013_1542690319776177_3940271278484623488_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=1147-6eZcZsQ7kNvwHyaYbO&_nc_oc=Adnjv4RMb7UDxy15oh2mlbV6abKG987Jcy17wn60NPmGIfmpLRJbQBq9YjlngDUoZAWA7IraYYPUacn2nt8ilTW5&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=iRs83z8gO3jPYazHXu7nng&oh=00_AfFrH3APCYNh-Goe7Y0qqw4BxbOuZlh_zEBT6HsGusUs3Q&oe=68159DA5)

Players can physically interact with the world of HITMAN in a number of different ways, including opening doors, dragging and throwing bodies, free-throwing items, vaulting, climbing pipes and ladders, free placing items such as the banana, using keypads, turning on vacuums, pistol whipping, punching, slapping, and more.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392000_605383185372249_2162841750422233084_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fWrz35bNsDcQ7kNvwF-QUOS&_nc_oc=Adno2tF2zn-R3LGnQtkaLKo8suG8-L0tQE0TakoshLDT9q2S50tulq3_h5XPHvA4aAqEKjE1ouCW9snBiQGXvmnX&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=iRs83z8gO3jPYazHXu7nng&oh=00_AfFiSUvJ_Xq4oneZLI-8yt0-Wx4LU3LL_0Q-R_1ACHy40Q&oe=6815A2F8)

Key Features include:

* **Dual-wielding**: For the first time in the series, HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded introduces dual-wielding, allowing players to use two weapons or items simultaneously, adding a new dimension to strategic gameplay.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392314_630254969406617_1085114267252557614_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=1p1dsXri0F0Q7kNvwE7T47N&_nc_oc=AdkzdT5H09pcFOL7ClzAdoVOCN78pVJAQZlgA7Nu3lpGrICo0AGhBaqX82F93bplR3PGcauMl87aaPvytbJ9lgEe&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=iRs83z8gO3jPYazHXu7nng&oh=00_AfE-JD4B-F3XBKFYHCJ4Tc5im32aMT89ATHEHkQN4mncpw&oe=6815CA49)

* **New art-style**: See Agent 47 in a whole new light with a new visual style that enhances the immersive experience.

* **Overhauled user interface**: HITMAN 3’s UI has been completely redesigned for VR, ensuring intuitive control and navigation as Agent 47.

* **Improved movement options**: HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded now offers fluid and natural movement options, making it easier than ever to navigate complex environments with speed and stealth.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393790_1157664059082415_1450910091917029518_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fF-qOwQdtuYQ7kNvwGd9ALu&_nc_oc=Admry_kKLAOzy6d9KrcMTFUEM4_YDIFCKm87SdtACMl9ixM5S3-nW8-5V5xAnWBJgwKH7wZMutLDy4AuMOd1kEt7&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=iRs83z8gO3jPYazHXu7nng&oh=00_AfGVSuSQOhg6eGm9jyzPAjZ_cfPSiLb61XGKA4sXplVp7w&oe=6815B32F)

* **Plus many more improvements**: From visual enhancements to refined gameplay mechanics, this is the most immersive untethered HITMAN VR experience to date, ensuring both HITMAN veterans and new players alike can enjoy the ultimate virtual reality assassination experience.
